H0.text: They are composed mostly of iron is the property thought to characterize objects in the Oort Cloud.

H1.text: They are composed mostly of ice is the property thought to characterize objects in the Oort Cloud.

H2.text: They regularly revolve near the Sun is the property thought to characterize objects in the Oort Cloud.

H3.text: They regularly replenish water on Earth is the property thought to characterize objects in the Oort Cloud.
